snippet: The Institute of Medicine says the American medical system loses $750 billion annually by squandering 30 cents of every dollar spent.
abstract: Institute of Medicine reports that the American medical system loses $750 billion annually by squandering 30 cents of every dollar spent; health care experts and economists see an opportunity in all that waste and misuse to curb runaway health spending and to improve medical outcomes.
lead_paragraph: The Institute of Medicine says the American medical system loses $750 billion annually by squandering 30 cents of every dollar spent.

headline.seo: Waste and Promise Seen in U.S. Health Care System
headline.main: Study of U.S. Health Care System Finds Both Waste and Opportunity to Improve
headline.print_headline: Study of U.S. Health Care System Finds Both Waste and Opportunity to Improve

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
